definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: Is there any special Tenimyu you're longing for?
sentences.chinese: 是否特別期待某一部舞臺劇？

sentences.english: Look for more to come and enjoy today's feature.
sentences.chinese: 敬請期待後續報道，享受今天的內容。

sentences.english: And today his campaign expects more super delegates will be announcing their support for Obama. Mara Liasson, NPR News, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 今天在競選中他期待更多超級代表的選票。

sentences.english: Will there be time for a question-and-answer segment?If so, anticipate the questions and prepare responses in advance, Ms. Blackman said.
sentences.chinese: 如果是，那麼期待會問哪些問題並之前準備迴應。

sentences.english: Expect to see more AI-based mobile technology quite soon.
sentences.chinese: 現在可以期待很快能看見更多的基於AI的移動技術。

sentences.english: The look in our mom's eyes shows great expectation for we children.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽的眼神包蘊着對我們的期待。

sentences.english: And the much-awaited announcement of the bank rescue plan left everyone confused rather than reassured.
sentences.chinese: 而期待已久的銀行救援計劃讓衆人疑惑而非放心。

sentences.english: Of course, I've booked the train tickets now. And Tom's looking forward to it.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，我已經訂了火車票了，而且湯姆也很期待。

sentences.english: I look forward to the day when the world economy returns to good health.
sentences.chinese: 我期待着，世界經濟終將柳暗花明，再度繁榮。

sentences.english: Choi, hailing from the country that first created this television formula, obviously knows well what audiences expect.
sentences.chinese: 來自此類節目創始國韓國的崔始源深諳觀衆的期待。

sentences.english: Week -long national day is coming. I'm looking forword to seeing Yun who was my good classmate at college.
sentences.chinese: 十一長假即將來臨，萬分期待着大學同學贇的到來。

sentences.english: Stay tuned for more reviews once I start to give it a work out.
sentences.chinese: 敬請期待更多的評論當我開始給它一個工作了。

sentences.english: B: That sounds great. I’m really looking forward to this.
sentences.chinese: 那太棒了，我真的很期待這樣。

sentences.english: So, when it comes to a film about Spider-Man, I have certain expectations.
sentences.chinese: 因此，每一部有關蜘蛛俠的電影，我都會滿心期待。

sentences.english: CM: Gaia is tired of expecting as well.
Would love to hear your stories.
sentences.chinese: 期待能夠聽到你的故事。

definition: hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to long for/to look forward to/longing/vision for the future
to hope for/to look forward to
lit. to wipe one's eyes and wait (idiom); to wait and see
to hold one's breath (in anticipation) (idiom)/to anxiously await
